reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: The Tonga Justice Sector Support Programme aims to build capability across the Tonga Justice Sector and to strengthen certain aspects of the justice system so the people of Tonga have good access to services within the justice system. The Activity will help strengthen the magistrates court, help establish a youth diversion scheme and strengthen reporting capability within the Ministry of Justice.
